website_summaries.verdict: An unbelievable price on a flat screen TV that's an affordable choice for a monitor or extra game room screen.
pros: Easy to use and to set-up
cons: Picture not as crisp as some models
The TV is not a smart-TV

customer_reviews.title: but this tv has worked just fine. People have complained about the tunnel like sound- ...
customer_reviews.text: It may not be a name brand, but this tv has worked just fine. People have complained about the tunnel like sound- however, if you go into advanced sound settings, you can change it to sound normal. I found out how to do that on YouTube and now it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woolery

customer_reviews.title: We own over 40 of these for our Vacation Rental Homes.
customer_reviews.text: We have vacation rental homes and buy Sceptre televisions for all of them. We have had great service out of everyone. One minor complaint is some of the battery covers come off a little easier than I would like but it is a minor issue overall. i think the packaging with tools to attach the bases is a great bonus. It shows someone cares.
customer_reviews.author: mark c

customer_reviews.title: A Value and Quality Made This College Student Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a TV could be so good at such a great price. I bought this for my dorm a few months ago and it doesn’t disappoint with its great resolution for being 720p, many input options (pictures showcase them), easy to understand remote, and great size. If you’re looking for a basic flatscreen TV you won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Samsung 32 inch TV
customer_reviews.text: Better than my Samsung 32 inch TV. Sounds great and unbeatable for the price. Just an FYI, it does take about 10 plus seconds for TV picture to go on after you enter on from the remote. Then again, I had it wall mounted from the box so maybe there is a setting for that.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great quality, sound is average
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great quality, sound is average. Arrived ahead of schedule, which I loved, and was easy to get out of the package and set up. If you're just looking for a TV to plug your gaming system or your smart device into, this is a great option. Would be a 5 star experience with the addition of a sound bar or speakers (which I don't expect the company to provide, just helpful information for people looking at their options!)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good basic TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a no frills TV. No built-in WiFi, no smart capabilities. Literally just a TV with a really clear picture and pretty acceptable sound. Bought this for my parents for their guest room. This replaced an old Hanspree TV that lasted a few years and saw some heavy PS3/Xbox 360 usage at the time. I'd recommend this TV for a kid's room, for a guest room, or for a secondary TV seeing general usage.
customer_reviews.author: Orbital

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware-Crappy Customer Support!
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrrived malfunctioning. There is a 2 inch strip on the side of the screen that as pixilated. Thee size of the strip grew larger in just a few weeks. The picture was from when she first plugged the tv in. It quickly spread. This tv was a gift for my daughter. She contacted the company that manufactured this tv and the only resolution they offered her was to ship it back for a cost that was more than half of the purchase price. I would nottot ever buy anything from this company or manufacturer ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Gulf Coast Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV. Now I never have to leave my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV. Now I never have to leave my garage!! 😅
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: WRONG VESA Mounting Hole Pattern in Sceptre documents.  Pattern is actually 100 x 200.
customer_reviews.text: The VESA mounting hole pattern is incorrect in the Sceptre documentation and the Amazon product page. The actual pattern on the product is 100 x 200 (not 100 x 100). Now I have to buy an adapter. I have never seen product specifications more messed up than they are with this product! On my way to get more screws. The correct screws needed to mount are M4 x 8mm long (not M6 as shown in all of the Sceptre literature). This sucks!
customer_reviews.author: E. Earnhart

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Waited a year to give a legit review. This TV has been operating on my Lanai outside in the Florida heat for a year. It's under a roof, but exposed to heat and humidity every day. I bought it because I didn't want to potentially destroy an expensive tv. This thing is chugging along like a champ. It's crazy loud too. The remote is mildly sun stained, but it's Florida so that can even happen inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sure, Not

customer_reviews.title: Received the TV today. Wanted to wall mount it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the TV today. Wanted to wall mount it, but the TV did not come with the needed screws for attaching it to the frame. The instruction manual said to use M6 type screws. Went to the hardware store to purchase it only to find that is not the right size. So the instruction in the manual was wrong :(. Went to hardware store again and finally found the screw type that fit, which was M4. While trying out different screws I damaged one of the mounting holes in TV. OH well.. All this time and frustration could have been avoided had the manufacturer sent the 4 correct screws in the package to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: ravira

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of garbage! I purchased this TV three months ago for my elderly father. The sound went out on it. I get it’s cheap but I’d expect more than three months! What a joke, here’s to a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Easy to install.  Works great with Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had a TV in our home for about 10 years. Had bought a Nintendo switch for my sons for Christmas and they wanted to get a Tv screen for it. This was reasonably priced and a decent quality. Their birthdays are in January so I got them one. Very happy. One son set it all up and had the switch operating in about 10 minutes.. so easy to set up. Decided to order an antenna so we can get local TV channels too now on it. Sure a “bleep” not paying for cable or satellite. And duh we do have WiFi .. forthose in shock about not having TVs. Could not run a business without the internet. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Allons97

customer_reviews.title: The way the screen looks
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is if you closely at the top screen you see how the light is coming through either the screen is totally off or the frame was not put together correctly.Be mindful of what you purchase when you try to save money you get something that is not quite what you expected
customer_reviews.author: Trina F

customer_reviews.title: Happy To Be A Couch Potato
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my decision to purchase the Sceptre 32" TV. The picture is sharp. The sound ( I often use headphones) is clear. The remote is easy to use. I wasn't familiar with Sceptre before, but now I highly recommend it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV....priced very well, picture is great. I would purchase another in the future
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly and seems to be a good product. The only strange thing is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and seems to be a good product. The only strange thing is that they sent a screwdriver with the tv to put the mounts on but no screws for the back of the tv to mount it to the wall. Seems like every house in the country probably has a screwdriver.. Might be cheaper and more useful to send the screws that fit the tv..
customer_reviews.author: J Maderious

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a second monitor for streaming services, not much else.
customer_reviews.text: Its not the best TV, but it does what I bought it for. I needed a second "monitor" for my computer so I could watch netflix and other streaming services. Coupled with a moving wall mount, it does exactly what its supposed to. A lot of complaints on here about it not working with cable, but I haven't tried that. If you want it for a second monitor (very important that you use it for movies and shows only) than its great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Salvaty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tv, works great
customer_reviews.text: Using for computer monitor. Have to play with the resolution on the pc a bit and the setup of the tv to get so it looks clean and crisp. Very nice tv, works great, using it for pc monitor and xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: sparks

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are terrible -sound completely muffled when the vol is raised
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this but the sound. True, you get what you pay for. I turned up the volume because a roommate was using a blender. With other TVs i've owned i can hear the audio distinctly which increasing the sound. This TV, the speakers sound muffled if i increase passed 8 (and that's 8 out of 100 on the volume meter). If you buy, you'll have to spend what you're saving and get some decent speakers. I'd return if i didn't already mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, contemporary, light weight. No complaints! Fits perfectly to the wall unit.
customer_reviews.author: gcy1

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. We are using for our 10 year old 's room. It's easy moved. Although it isnt 1080p He is still able to enjoy playing PS4 and xbox without any compliants.
customer_reviews.author: Sueann

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - for less than 30 hours. COMPLETE TRASH
customer_reviews.text: This worked great right out of the box. The interface isn't super intuitive, but that didn't really bother me. After 3 weeks using only for a couple hours a night at bedtime, the display stopped working and only showed bluish-white vertical lines. Some things are worth paying a little extra for - move on to a higher end, quality TV that will last. This one is crap.
customer_reviews.author: King Babaloo

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a PC monitor
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a larger monitor for my computer setup. This one was certainly an excellent price. It works well. One quirk, which maybe I just don't know how to fix, the date and time are wrong and there's no obvious way to set it properly. At least my task bar from Windows keeps date and time correctly. This is really no big deal. I had no problem getting this and my computer hooked together. Every couple of hours, it wants to turn off because it isn't detecting a broadcast input. I find the countdown (30 seconds to shutting down, etc.) rather amusing. For $99.99 (what I paid), it's a great deal for a 32" monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Cellophane Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good investment, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, don't expect real to life pictures. This isn't a 4k TV, and it's not a 1080p either. Despite that, the clarity on the TV is really good if you take the time to fiddle with the settings when setting it up. Lastly, who needs a smart TV when you can hook an Amazon Firestick up to this and get all the same features and functionality of a smart tv?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: While the picture quality is nice, the speakers are very poor
customer_reviews.text: While the picture quality is nice, the speakers are very poor. I used an old set of speakers I had in a closet, so it's fine now. But the remote just flaked out on me, just 3 months after purchasing. No matter which button I press, it shows the Source category (and there must be 50 buttons). The best part was the price, but with all these hassles, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Touché Targét

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, great price for such a large TV. The picture quality and sound quality are surprisingly good too considering the price. The TV came with a free screwdriver for installing the stand. The cable is kind of short, but that's not a huge problem. My only complaint would be the packaging. It was difficult to unbox everything.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Great....but........
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. Fast shipping from seller. Great picture quality, easy set-up. I didn't give it 4 stars because of the sound. Sound is "tinny". Had to return - sound is awful.....
customer_reviews.author: cervezagut

customer_reviews.title: YOU CANT GO WRONG
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I gave tech support 5 stars on faith because this TV is so good, I never had to use tech support at all but if they make tvs this nice: I'm sure their tech support is awesome. The color on this tv set is much nicer than my other large screen tvs I've gotten in the past and the sound quality is great too! I can even hear this clearly over a fan which I keep on constantly. It also sits neatly on my dresser with plenty of room left over for my doodads and colognes! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: mark debrizzi

customer_reviews.title: distorted picture do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This set is unable to produce a 4 x 3 aspect ratio, and will stretch the picture (making it unwatchable for me). I bought a similar Sceptre 32" w/ a built in dvd player, and it does produce the 4 x 3 picture. I called tech support, and was greeted by the rudest tech I've ever spoken with. He said what I got is what I got. And that's the way they make them now. My last Sceptre tv.
customer_reviews.author: Bamadog 72

customer_reviews.title: Great 32" TV for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Order this TV based on recommendations that stated that Sceptre was a high tech product that was inexpensive. SO far we have been impressed with the TV sound, should note that there are two sound modes. We use it in a bedroom and get more than enough sound to enjoy shows and movies. The picture is great and sharp. It is light weight so can be mounted on the wall or using the included stand on a cabinet or dresser. We use an over the air antenna and get great reception. Would recommend the brand and this specific model.
customer_reviews.author: S E Morris

customer_reviews.title: Has Strong Odor/Smell
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up. Great sound. You get what you pay for, but it's fine. I thought it was a 32" diagonal TV which is how I thought all TVs were, but it's just 32" wide and very short in height. I wasn't expecting that. The main negative point about it is the strong odor/smell radiating out of it whether it is on or not. UGH!! I might have to return it due to that. Has anyone else experienced this, and if so, does the smell go away and how long does it take? UPDATE: I just started a return because the strong odor has not gone away! The seller was very understanding and kind when I contacted him.
customer_reviews.author: musicallyyours

customer_reviews.title: Guess room TV with not so good quality
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and you can see the pixels in faces and other areas. I am not pleased with the picture quality but hey, it is being used in my guest room (which Is hardly used). You get what you pay for, so shop around if you want a better quality television.
customer_reviews.author: CAMooreofme2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: TV was delivered the next day! Set up was easy...really appreciated that Sceptre thoughtfully included a small screwdriver in the packet to attach the stand legs (saved me an hour of searching for mine!). Picture is great, sound is more than sufficient for a bedroom. Just one day in, but so far very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tikigirl

customer_reviews.title: An Asset and a Liability
customer_reviews.text: This TV is an asset in that I now have a TV in my home office. I spend a lot of time at the computer and now that the TV is mounted on the wall, I can keep up with weather, news, etc. without having to leave the room and interrupt what I'm doing. It's definitely a liability because the HDMI ports do not work. Unfortunately, a few months had passed (due to health issues) before I could have my son-in-law check them out and discover that they didn't work. No satisfaction from Amazon or manufacturer due to being outside the time limit.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: You'll need speakers, but overall great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a super-loaded display, which is fine because it's just our bedroom TV. For what we paid for this, it's great! Nice picture, super light, easy to set up. I took away a star simply because the speakers are almost useless. Yes, it's a cheap TV, but it shouldn't sound like the audio is coming from a tin can (actually, a tin can would have more bass.) I hooked up some old computer speakers to it and am happy overall. Time will tell how long this will last, but these days who knows? I had a commercial 'heavy duty' display that lasted 2 years, and a cheap LCD that lasted 10 years. It's all a crap shoot.
customer_reviews.author: truejabber

customer_reviews.title: AUDIO GOES OUT OF SYNC WATCHING BROADCAST TV
customer_reviews.text: Good if all you need is something to watch your FireTV, Roku, etc.. through. If you are planning to use it to watch OTA signals, beware that if you leave it on any one channel too long, eventually the sound and video will go out of sync. This happens on any channel. Easily resolved by changing the channel and then back, but still annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than 18 months, but it had an excellent picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: This TV had a lot going for it, except durability. It did in approximately 18 months and wasn’t on most of the time. On the plus side, it was easy to install out of the box, and I was very pleased with its performance. The picture was sharp, the color vibrant and correct, and the sound excellent. I didn't buy it for other features and don't know if it does anything else, but it's an excellent TV for watching movies, news and TV shows; provided you’re not looking for durability.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eckman

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for an apartment I rent during the week while away from my home. I wanted something inexpensive, yet reliable. My first take was the price is too good to be true, but after almost 3 months of use it is an awesome buy. Picture quality great and no problems at all with sound, etc. Like reading in some reviews. I am totally happy with this purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: roadglideclide

customer_reviews.title: For $100, you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice TV set. The picture quality is good, and it accepts any manner of peripheral devices. You can even use it as a giant computer monitor with the VGA input! That's handy if a monitor breaks down. It may not be a 4K TV, it may not be a smart TV. You don't get that for 100 dollars. What you do get is something that is fine quality. Overall, I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement monitor for a burned in 29" CRT House of the Dead 4 arcade machine. Didn't need anything over 720p, but I did need a VGA input which is getting hard to find these days. Out of the box this worked great and the default setting look fanastic. As for TV use, there are a lack of traditional settings to fine tune the picture which is a disappointment. The power cord is attached which is something I personally don't like but was still long enough for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey F.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this television a week ago and not a bad tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this television a week ago and not a bad tv for the price. I don't have cable and use a digital tv antenna. Despite some of the complaints that I've read about how some people had problems with scanning channels I didn't have that problem. In fact, I was able to scan way more local digital channels than with my last television set. The only complaint I have is that the built-in speaker sounds a little cheesy and I'm not crazy about legs that come with it but, other than that, it's not a bad tv at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived on time. It is easy to set up and install. Our TV easily configured to the requirements of our internet provider. The quality oof the TV picture is excellent. The colors are vibrant and life like. The sound quality is very good. The size of the picture is adequate for an average size bedroom or kitchen. A very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE

customer_reviews.title: Quality so far, for the price=100% satisfied!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Gave 5 star picture and sound quality so far because I have not had the tv long enough yet but for the price also this tv is also pretty easy to set up through the on screen prompts and remote control. Have not yet had to call tech support. Overall am 100% satisfied. Would most definitely purchase this tv again and recommend to others. Hopefully it lasts long enough, we will see. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: H.W

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Christmas for both of our kids and they are so perfect for watching Netflix and playing video games. They have great speakers and can get very loud, they are also light weight and were easy to hang on the wall. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mitch buhre

customer_reviews.title: Grandson saved money for this. Happy young man. Great company
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My grandson saved his birthday money. Box was open. That's not cool. But tv works great. Thank you for making my 13 yr old grandson happy. I didn't want him to order online. But glad I did........ Thanks again. Buy from them. Fast time. Getting here.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are really a great value for the price here. We liked this so much, we ordered 2 more for the rest of the house!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: ATV worth its money
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the item. It came on the 28th of June which was yesterday Friday. The box was easy to open. I was able to assemble everything quickly. I plugged everything in. It was easy to set up. All my devices that are connected to the TV work fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The tv wont turn on. Used maybe 1 dozen times before it died. Only had it 3 months but it was too late to do anything about it through Amazon. I have emailed sceptre customer service and am waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Probably worth the gamble for a guest room tv
customer_reviews.text: First TV that came had a line across the screen horizontally and based on the reviews I decided this was a fluke and re ordered and returned it. The mounting with the recommended genie mount is pretty easy but the surprise came when the second TV arrived and I had to attach the extender brackets as the backing was completely different. Still not a hard fix but it tells you something about the mixing of parts. The sound is definitely a meh on the wow factor but this is a kids playroom TV. Not meant to wow and if you're spending 100 on your main TV you might want to re evaluate some things.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Above Average
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great, though it also depends on its input (some things just don't display as well as others). The power usage is low, another plus. The sound quality is utter garbage, though. If you're planning on getting this for its price, go get a sound bar as well. Other than that, does its job pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Christian K.

customer_reviews.title: Good TV For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: As others have said before me, this tv is good-- except for the sound. Most cheaper flat screens have sound issues so I wasn't surprised- or that disappointed. An inexpensive sound bar remedies the situation. Picture is great and it looks good, too. Setup and install was very easy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DPBgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worst TV ever
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this tv. I can swear to God. I only used this for my Xbox and it stopped working after 2 months. The screen doesnt show up. Just black screen. I will never buy product from Sceptre from now on and also, I will let everyone know how terrible these tvs are.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Seo

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how they can make a television of this high quality for such a low price! It's not a SMART TV, but has 3 HDMI ports, it says 720p but notifies me on several channels that it's receiving a 1080p broadcast. The HD quality is exceptional and I think that the sound is just right for a unit this size. We're using it in an extra bedroom, but it holds it's own against the more expensive sets we have in the other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: sbc2556

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this TV primarily as a computer monitor, (1366x758 is the max), and I'm very happy with the results. I also have no complaints about picture quality or sound when using it as a TV. It is very light and mounted on a wall bracket above my computer. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Piyawan P.

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy/Low contrast appearance on the screen.
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a camera monitor for several of our cameras and find that the picture isn't near as sharp as some of out other TVs that are used in the same manner. We're not finding where you can make adjustments for brightness & contrast so we stuck with: "ya get what ya get"! It'll work, but disappointed right off the bat. Can't say anything about the longevity, as we have only had it hook up a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival, Case not closed properly, power cable not secured
customer_reviews.text: Product would not power right out of the box. Upon closer inspection the power cable was not anchored into the back case. Furthermore, the plastic snap fit connectors on the bottom we're on the outside of the case instead of the inside like their supposed to be. This is either a product of terrible manufacturing quality control or I received a refurbished product without disclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Yumazona

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Priced,Good TV for a Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a TV for this price from a brand I’d never previously owned. My ancient, heavy bedroom TV finally quit working and I had to have a replacement. This TV is wonderful for a bedroom TV. I thought I might need a sound bar from reading other reviews, but I’m glad I didn’t purchase one. So far the sound hasn’t been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Raebug’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV but Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad tv for the price...it works really well. For me the big downfall is the speakers are on the bottom of the tv pointing down...well that is just silly and it muffles a lot of the sound and it just isn't even good quality sound. Now I just bought a nice surround sound system to fix that problem but I will warn anyone with hearing problems...this may not be a good choice for you unless you decide to do like I did and get a sound system with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Re COAXIAL TUNER for channel scanning!!
customer_reviews.text: Had same problem at first! Wouldnt pick up channels during scan with my Free TV antenna! I did as suggested by one purchaser under reviews...laid tv face down...pulled down on lever beside tuner coaxial...a pocket slid out when I pulled outward....I then reseated it firmly ....scanned for channels and got some!!! Very simple! Love picture! Improvised on my sound! All is well!!!
customer_reviews.author: CAROL E

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre 32 inch LED TV
customer_reviews.text: My old TV died and I needed a new one for above my family room fire place fast. The Septre was a brand I was not familiar with but the price was great. Easy installation. It has since been moved to the Master Bedroom as apparently there was nothing wrong with my 3 yr old LED TV, just someone pushed the wong buttons. I am now enjoying the larger TV in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Harrow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months to see if any problems arise with it. So far, nice picture and works well for what I wanted it for. Pretty good price for what you get. Only complaint would be the volume. It'll go from 6-7 and it seems like quite a jump. However, the sound itself is of pretty decent quality for what you pay for. (If i could I'd give it a 4.5 star rating).
customer_reviews.author: Aberdeen

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a really quality TV. I had gotten a 55 inch too and read that the sound quality was bad, but the 32 in sound quality was actually pretty good much to my surprise. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture and loud sound! Bought 2 of these for my kids for Christmas they loved them!!! Great price also
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh baney

customer_reviews.title: Review is fake
customer_reviews.text: I personally give this tv about 3.5 to 4 star that being said it work great the color is little off and look really bad if you are not looking right in front of it .but other than that it a pretty solid TV .but u wondering why I give this a 1 star well all those "5 star " are people trying to get $5 . pretty much faking the review
customer_reviews.author: chadd simoneau

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive TV
customer_reviews.text: The TV has enough inputs, especially for a bedroom. The sound isn't fantastic, but again, it's in a bedroom, so it's fine. Picture quality is really good, especially considering the price. This is my second Septre TV and they're nice, inexpensive TV's in spare rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lang

customer_reviews.title: Worth It

customer_reviews.title: Average screen that you can't beat the price on.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent screen but the attractive value here is in the price. For the $99 that I paid it was what I expected. The picture isn't great but it's not bad. For the price you can't go wrong but don't expect crystal clear quality. Also I'm using mine on a 2nd video card output from my PC so the graininess is a bit worse than it would be as a regular TV screen. Not bad if you know what to expect.

customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a TV that will last less than a year (8 months to be exact) before the picture goes out (first horizontal and vertical lines..then those lines with a black dot ⚫️ in the corner which signifies internal component failure) and ‘customer service’ tells you it’s caused from ‘physical damages’ and they will not honor the One Year Warranty then this is the one for you!
